comment: /**  * Gets the underlying {@link File} that allows to read the contents of the file.  *  * @return A handle to the File object.  */
code: /**  * Gets the underlying {@link File} that allows to read the contents of the file.  *  * @return A handle to the File object.  */ public abstract File getInputFile().

comment: /**  * Checks if the file is closed for writes.  *  * @return {@link true} if the file is closed, {@link false} otherwise.  */
code: /**  * Checks if the file is closed for writes.  *  * @return {@link true} if the file is closed, {@link false} otherwise.  */ public abstract boolean isClosed() throws IOException.
